title: SSDs Crucial
extract: Solid state drives (SSDs) are designed to store important data and speed up your system. Designed with no moving parts, this means SSDs improve battery life. ... Use the Crucial® Advisor™ tool or System Scanner tool for guaranteed compatible upgrades and shop our range of SSDs.
extract_html: Solid state drives (SSDs) are designed to store important data and speed up your system. Designed with no moving parts, this means SSDs improve battery life. ... Use the Crucial® Advisor™ tool or System Scanner tool for guaranteed compatible upgrades and shop our range of SSDs.
